title: The Incredible Melting Man (1977 Sci-Fi) From space hero to Earth's ultimate predator

sources.title: The Incredible Melting Man (1977 Sci-Fi) From space hero to Earth's ultimate predator
sources.description:
After astronaut Steve West is exposed to cosmic radiation, his body begins to horrifyingly melt while his mind descends into madness, turning him into a relentless predator. As Dr. Ted Nelson races against time to stop his liquefying friend, the hunt becomes a deadly game of survival with humanity hanging in the balance!

Original title: The Incredible Melting Man (1977)
Alternative title: The Ghoul from Outer Space

Budget: $250,000
Genres: Science Fiction, Horror
Release date: December 9, 1977
Filming location: Los Angeles, USA
